entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ScrollView with BindableLayout.ItemsSource is not recalculate new size on iOS #12727
  • DragGestureRecognizer CanDrag binding not working properly #12726
  • [WinUI] CarouselView "Scrolled" event never fires #12725
  • Add platform selectors in maui templates #12716
    Backlog
  • [Android]camera permission is not enabled on launching the maui app #12711
  • Refreshview makes scrollview vanish on android #12710
  • ResourceDictionary Source-Property not settable #12709
    Backlog

Closed

  • StackLayout IsEnabled Property does not work #5287
    .NET 7 Planning
  • IsEnabled not working properly for layout #4755
    Backlog
  • Image in Radio Button Not Displayed in Android Platform #12645
  • Where is toolbox? #12667
  • [SOLVED] Windows x86 Exception #12717
  • Custom Android Handler throws NRE when using Cell.ToPlatform(MauiContext) #11980
  • .Net MAUI - Shell Navigation Back button title not works properly - #iOS #12692
  • android application with testOnly option set to true can't be deployed #11345
    Backlog
  • Flyout items can vanish when arrowing down through a flyout. #11522
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Setting 'CanExecute' doesn't change the status of Button controls when they are bound to MVVM Commands #9753
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplification of interface declaration in code #12728
    community ✨
  • Update SemanticScreenReader API Docs #12724
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Share API Docs #12722
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Merge main into net8 #12715
  • Changes how propagate brushes changes #12714
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1462.37 to 1.0.1518.46 #12712
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Propagate VisualElement.IsEnabled to children #12488
  • Update Essentials Contact objects API Docs #12713
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Actions] Provide an actin that will bump the maui hash in the unified pipeline. #12718
    community ✨

Updated

  • Connect gestures LifeCycle to Container and Window #12259
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Fix timing on iOS Toolbar #12363
    area/shell 🐢, area/toolbar
  • [release/7.0.1xx-sr1.2] Disable the windows deployment manager by default #12698
  • [Windows] Align Graphics APIs naming with the rest of the platforms #12578
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.2 to 4.14.2 #12686
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Generate everything splash related in the splash target #12481
    area/single project ☝️
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12679
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
